𓊪 𓄡 𓂋 𓏏 𓄶 𓇳 •pasharad π"circle" ⇔ 9 new

𓊪 𓄡 𓂋 𓏏 𓄶 𓇳 ବୃତ୍ତ bruttô বৃত্ত britt porowhita پرهون parhun 𓍲 𓈖 𓏌 𓅱 𓍶 "circle"

𓂂 qurt 𓈎 𓂋 𓏏 𓂂 carved cavity 𒋛 𒇂 𒇄 see fruit

𓃉 𓋪 ⲕⲣⲓⲕⲟⲥ κίρκος kírkos, “circle, ring” cyclos 𓍶 κρίκος kríkos, “ring” (ri/ri swap)
𓃉 𓋪 Kreis *(s)ker- “to bend, turn” *ᵏwreyt- “to turn” ⇔ wend bend
𓃉 𓋪 قُرْص qurṣ circle “disk” Kugel “pill” (plural أَقْرَاص ʾaqrāṣ) @ Arabic!

full circle 𓐍 ◍ ● 𒊹 ⚫ ⚪ “disk”

English often confuses the outer circle with the "filled inner circle" aka "disk"

Resulting in Unicode abcesses like
0x25CB 9675 WHITE CIRCLE ○
0x25CF 9679 BLACK CIRCLE ● (makes no sense in dark mode or with font colors)
